events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application online for covering medical expenses.
The loan application was categorized under personal loans as the customer specified medical treatment financing.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to assist the applicant through the required documentation process.
Initial review was conducted to verify application details and check basic eligibility criteria for the loan.
The applicant was requested to submit medical bills, proof of income, and identity verification documents.
All requested documents, including medical invoices and recent pay stubs, were submitted successfully by the applicant.
Credit history review was completed showing a stable credit score with no recent defaults or delinquencies.
Risk assessment process finalized with moderate risk rating based on financial stability and loan purpose.
A personal loan offer specifying terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule was shared with the applicant.
Applicant provided feedback requesting clarification on monthly payment amounts and early repayment options.
The application was escalated to a senior officer to address applicant queries and negotiate loan terms.
After review, the personal loan application was approved with agreed-upon terms suitable to the applicant’s needs.
Loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for immediate use in medical expenses.
Follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant understood repayment schedules and to answer any further questions.
The loan process was formally closed after confirming all applicant concerns were resolved and documentation completed.
